verses.verse: And when <S%G3753><s%> they came <S%G1448><s%> near to Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> to Bethphage <S%G967><s%> and Bethany, <S%G963><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives, <S%G1636><s%> he sends <S%G649><s%> forth <S%G1614><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of his disciples, <S%G3101><s%>

And said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Go <S%G5217><s%> your way into <S%G1519><s%> the village <S%G2968><s%> over <S%G2713><s%> against <S%G2713><s%> you: and as soon <S%G2112><s%> as you be entered <S%G1531><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> it, you shall find <S%G2147><s%> a colt <S%G4454><s%> tied, <S%G1210><s%> where on <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3739><s%> never <S%G3762><s%> <S%G4455><s%> man <S%G444><s%> sat; <S%G2523><s%> loose <S%G3089><s%> him, and bring <S%G71><s%> him.

And if <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> man say <S%G2036><s%> to you, Why <S%G5101><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> you this? <S%G5124><s%> say <S%G2036><s%> you that the Lord <S%G2962><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of him; and straightway <S%G2112><s%> he will send <S%G649><s%> him here. <S%G5602><s%>

And they went <S%G565><s%> their way, and found <S%G2147><s%> the colt <S%G4454><s%> tied <S%G1210><s%> by the door <S%G2374><s%> without <S%G1854><s%> in a place where <S%G296><s%> two <S%G296><s%> ways <S%G296><s%> met; <S%G296><s%> and they loose <S%G3089><s%> him.

And they said <S%G2036><s%> to them even <S%G2531><s%> as Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had commanded: <S%G1781><s%> and they let <S%G863><s%> them go. <S%G863><s%>
And they brought <S%G71><s%> the colt <S%G4454><s%> to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and cast <S%G1911><s%> their garments <S%G2440><s%> on <S%G1911><s%> him; and he sat <S%G2523><s%> on him.

And many <S%G4183><s%> spread <S%G4766><s%> their garments <S%G2440><s%> in the way: <S%G3598><s%> and others <S%G243><s%> cut <S%G2875><s%> down <S%G2523><s%> branches <S%G4746><s%> off <S%G1537><s%> the trees, <S%G1186><s%> and strewed <S%G4766><s%> them in the way. <S%G3598><s%>

And they that went <S%G4254><s%> before, <S%G4254><s%> and they that followed, <S%G190><s%> cried, <S%G2896><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Hosanna; <S%G5614><s%> Blessed <S%G2127><s%> is he that comes <S%G2064><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord: <S%G2962><s%>

Blessed <S%G2127><s%> be the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of our father <S%G3962><s%> David, <S%G1138><s%> that comes <S%G2064><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord: <S%G2962><s%> Hosanna <S%G5614><s%> in the highest. <S%G5310><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> and into <S%G1519><s%> the temple: <S%G2411><s%> and when he had looked <S%G4017><s%> round <S%G4017><s%> about <S%G4017><s%> on all <S%G3956><s%> things, and now <S%G2235><s%> the eventide <S%G3798><s%> <S%G5610><s%> was come, <S%G1511><s%> he went <S%G1831><s%> out to Bethany <S%G963><s%> with the twelve. <S%G1427><s%>
And on the morrow, <S%G1887><s%> when they were come <S%G1831><s%> from Bethany, <S%G963><s%> he was hungry: <S%G3983><s%>

And seeing <S%G1492><s%> a fig <S%G4808><s%> tree <S%G4808><s%> afar <S%G3113><s%> off having <S%G2192><s%> leaves, <S%G5444><s%> he came, <S%G2064><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> haply <S%G686><s%> he might find <S%G2147><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> thing thereon: <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> and when he came <S%G2064><s%> to it, he found <S%G2147><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> but leaves; <S%G5444><s%> for the time <S%G2540><s%> of figs <S%G4810><s%> was not yet.

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to it, No <S%G3367><s%> man <S%G3367><s%> eat <S%G5315><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> of you hereafter <S%G3371><s%> for ever. <S%G165><s%> And his disciples <S%G3101><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it.

And they come <S%G2064><s%> to Jerusalem: <S%G2414><s%> and Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple, <S%G2411><s%> and began <S%G756><s%> to cast <S%G1544><s%> out them that sold <S%G4453><s%> and bought <S%G59><s%> in the temple, <S%G2411><s%> and overthrew <S%G2690><s%> the tables <S%G5132><s%> of the moneychangers, <S%G2855><s%> and the seats <S%G2515><s%> of them that sold <S%G4453><s%> doves; <S%G4058><s%>
And would not suffer <S%G863><s%> that any <S%G1536><s%> man should carry <S%G1808><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> vessel <S%G4632><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the temple. <S%G2411><s%>

And he taught, <S%G2258><s%> <S%G1321><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, Is it not written, <S%G1125><s%> My house <S%G3624><s%> shall be called <S%G2564><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of prayer? <S%G4335><s%> but you have made <S%G4160><s%> it a den <S%G4693><s%> of thieves. <S%G3027><s%>

And the scribes <S%G1122><s%> and chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it, and sought <S%G2212><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> they might destroy <S%G622><s%> him: for they feared <S%G5399><s%> him, because <S%G3754><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> was astonished <S%G1605><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> his doctrine. <S%G1322><s%>
And when <S%G3753><s%> even <S%G3796><s%> was come, <S%G1096><s%> he went <S%G1607><s%> out of the city. <S%G4172><s%>
And in the morning, <S%G4404><s%> as they passed <S%G3899><s%> by, they saw <S%G1492><s%> the fig <S%G4808><s%> tree <S%G4808><s%> dried <S%G3583><s%> up from the roots. <S%G4491><s%>

And Peter <S%G4074><s%> calling <S%G363><s%> to remembrance <S%G364><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Master, <S%G4461><s%> behold, <S%G2396><s%> the fig <S%G4808><s%> tree <S%G4808><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you cursed <S%G2672><s%> is withered <S%G3583><s%> away.
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Have <S%G2192><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in God. <S%G2316><s%>

For truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, That whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall say <S%G2036><s%> to this <S%G5129><s%> mountain, <S%G3735><s%> Be you removed, <S%G142><s%> and be you cast <S%G906><s%> into the sea; <S%G2281><s%> and shall not doubt <S%G1252><s%> in his heart, <S%G2588><s%> but shall believe <S%G4100><s%> that those things which <S%G3739><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> shall come <S%G1096><s%> to pass; he shall have <S%G2071><s%> whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> he said. <S%G3004><s%>

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, What <S%G3745><s%> things soever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> you desire, <S%G154><s%> when you pray, <S%G4336><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> that you receive <S%G2983><s%> them, and you shall have <S%G2071><s%> them.

And when <S%G3752><s%> you stand <S%G4739><s%> praying, <S%G4336><s%> forgive, <S%G863><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> ought <S%G5100><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> any: <S%G1536><s%> that your <S%G5216><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in heaven <S%G3772><s%> may forgive <S%G863><s%> you your <S%G5216><s%> trespasses. <S%G3900><s%>

But if <S%G1487><s%> you do not forgive, <S%G863><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> will your <S%G5216><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in heaven <S%G3772><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> trespasses. <S%G3900><s%>

And they come <S%G2064><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to Jerusalem: <S%G2414><s%> and as he was walking <S%G4043><s%> in the temple, <S%G2411><s%> there come <S%G2064><s%> to him the chief <S%G749><s%> priests, <S%G749><s%> and the scribes, <S%G1122><s%> and the elders, <S%G4245><s%>

The baptism <S%G908><s%> of John, <S%G2491><s%> was it from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> of men? <S%G444><s%> answer <S%G611><s%> me.

And they reasoned <S%G3049><s%> with themselves, <S%G1438><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> we shall say, <S%G2036><s%> From heaven; <S%G3772><s%> he will say, <S%G2046><s%> Why <S%G1302><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> did you not believe <S%G4100><s%> him?

And they answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> We cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1492><s%> tell. <S%G1492><s%> And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Neither <S%G3761><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you by what <S%G4169><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> I do these <S%G5023><s%> things.
